Name: Project Deadline Must Be Met
Description: Project End date cannot be exceeded

Name: Team Size Limit
Description: Team size must not exceed predefined maximum

Name: Employee Availability
Description: Employees must be available during sprint periods

Name: Skill Matching
Description: Tasks require assigned employees to have necessary skills

Name: No Overlapping Sprint Assignments
Description: A User Story cannot be assigned to multiple simultaneous sprints

Name: Task Effort Bound
Description: Task effort must be within realistic effort estimates

Name: Blockers Must Be Resolved
Description: Blockers must be resolved within defined time after detection

Name: Product Owner Manages One Backlog
Description: Each Product Owner manages exactly one Product Backlog

Name: Scrum Master Assigned
Description: Each Team must be supported by exactly one Scrum Master
